reasoning: Reporting incidence. Pancreatic cancer incidence from GLOBOCAN 2005 shows ~8.2 per 100k globally, with higher rates in developed countries (10-12 per 100k) and lower in developing regions (5-7 per 100k).
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
